ledger for \"gold accounts\" (IGAN) owned by GIFT members. Responsibilities: - Create and register gold accounts for active members - Maintain per-account gold balance (units/tokens) - Provide controlled balance mutation via:   - GMO / VAULT (admin path)   - Whitelisted contracts (system path) Design notes: - Accounts are keyed by `igan` (string) to stay aligned with off-chain IDs. - Member validity is delegated to `IMemberRegistry`. - This contract does NOT custody ERC20/ETH; it only maintains a ledger.","errors":{"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. params._memberRegistry: Address of the IMemberRegistry contract to integrate with.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBalanceUpdater(address,bool).details: Callable only by GMO. Intended for system contracts like GoldAssetToken.

params.allowed: Whether the address is allowed to call `updateBalanceFromContract`.
params.updater: Address of the contract (or EOA) to update.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateBalance(string,int256,string,uint2.details: - Callable by GMO or VAULT. - `delta` can be positive (credit) or negative (debit). - Reverts if resulting balance would be negative.

updateBalanceFromContract(string,int256,.details: - Caller must be marked as `balanceUpdaters[caller] == true`. - Intended for programmatic flows (e.g., asset lifecycle).

MEMBER_ACTIVE().notice: Member status value indicating an active member in IMemberRegistry.

ROLE_REFINER().notice: Role bitmasks aligned to the access matrix.

accounts(string).notice: Mapping from IGAN to account details.

addressAccounts(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from owner address to list of IGANs controlled by that address.

balanceUpdaters(address).notice: Whitelisted contracts allowed to update balances via `updateBalanceFromContract`.

memberAccounts(string,uint256).notice: Mapping from member GIC to list of IGANs they own.

memberRegistry().notice: Registry used to check member roles and statuses.

setBalanceUpdater(address,bool).notice: Grants or revokes permission for an address to update balances via `updateBalanceFromContract`.

updateBalance(string,int256,string,uint2.notice: Adjusts an account balance (admin / human path).

updateBalanceFromContract(string,int256,.notice: Adjusts an account balance from a whitelisted contract (system path).
